p: Compared with the transcriptome previously developed for R. mangle that was sequenced using a 454/Roche GSFLX platform (Roche Applied Science, Indianapolis, IN, United States) ( Dassanayake et al., 2009), the assembly in this study contained 10,048 new contigs. Out of the 44,481 annotated contigs from our transcriptome, 34,433 contigs were homologous to the previously reported transcriptome.
